pathToCompiler.description: The absolute path to the lslcomp.exe of Sei-Lisa's LSL-compiler. (https://github.com/Sei-Lisa/LSL-compiler)

pathToViewerTempFolder.description: The absolute path to the folder where the viewer creates the temporary .lsl-files of currently opened scripts.

pathToKwdbFile.description: The absolute path to the latest KWDB.xml file. (https://bitbucket.org/Sei_Lisa/kwdb/src/default/)

pathToSLWikiCacheFile.description: Absolute path to the file which should be used to cache keyword definitions fetched from the Second Life wiki. (Will be created if not existing)

pathToLocalDocFile.description: Absolute path to the file which will be used to store user specific documentation entries for standard lsl keywords. (Will be created if not existing)

pathToViewerCacheFolder.description: The absolute path to the viewer's cache folder.
